name: Escaping Home (AveNyrh)
description:
Game made during the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Theme : Out of Control

In this game, you escape from your home in your self-made spaceship.

Try to survive by keeping that spaceship in good shape.

Made by :

- Lizeth Rayo Trujillo (first jam) : 3D, Music and SFX

- Axel de Conti : Game design, Programmation
